mapper.select: SELECT CPU_TOTAL,CPU_USAGE,CPU_USED,MEMORY_TOTAL,MEMORY_USAGE,MEMORY_USED FROM TB_PAAS_ZHZY WHERE APPLY_NAME=#{appName} AND TYPE_SITE=#{typeSite}

SELECT APPLY_NAME,ELASTICSEARCH_CPU_TOTAL,ELASTICSEARCH_CPU_USAGE,ELASTICSEARCH_MEMORY_TOTAL,ELASTICSEARCH_MEMORY_USED,ELASTICSEARCH_DISK_AVAILABLE,ELASTICSEARCH_DISK_USED FROM TB_PAAS_ZHZY WHERE APPLY_NAME=#{appName}
SELECT APPLY_NAME,REDIS_MEMORY_TOTAL,REDIS_MEMORY_USAGE FROM TB_PAAS_ZHZY WHERE APPLY_NAME=#{appName}
SELECT TYPE_SITE FROM TB_PAAS_ZHZY WHERE APPLY_NAME=#{appName}
SELECT ELASTICSEARCH_STORAGE_SPACE FROM TB_PAAS_ZHZY WHERE APPLY_NAME=#{appName}
SELECT REDIS_CLUSTER_NAME FROM TB_PAAS_ZHZY WHERE APPLY_NAME=#{appName}
SELECT max(CPU_USAGE) CPU_USAGE FROM TB_PAAS_ZHZY WHERE TYPE_SITE='hadoop'
SELECT max(MEMORY_USAGE) MEMORY_USAGE FROM TB_PAAS_ZHZY WHERE TYPE_SITE='hadoop'
SELECT NVL(max(STORAGE_TOTAL),0) STORAGE_TOTAL,NVL(max(STORAGE_USED),0) STORAGE_USED FROM TB_PAAS_ZHZY WHERE TYPE_SITE='hadoop'
SELECT NVL(max(CPU_USAGE),0) CPU_USAGE FROM TB_PAAS_ZHZY WHERE TYPE_SITE='Libra'
SELECT NVL(max(MEMORY_USAGE),0) MEMORY_USAGE FROM TB_PAAS_ZHZY WHERE TYPE_SITE='Libra'
SELECT NVL(max(STORAGE_TOTAL),0) STORAGE_TOTAL,NVL(max(STORAGE_USED),0) STORAGE_USED FROM TB_PAAS_ZHZY WHERE TYPE_SITE='Libra'
SELECT NVL(max(ELASTICSEARCH_CPU_USAGE),0) ELASTICSEARCH_CPU_USAGE FROM TB_PAAS_ZHZY
SELECT NVL(max(ELASTICSEARCH_MEMORY_TOTAL),0) ELASTICSEARCH_MEMORY_TOTAL,NVL(max(ELASTICSEARCH_MEMORY_USED),0) ELASTICSEARCH_MEMORY_USED FROM TB_PAAS_ZHZY
SELECT NVL(max(ELASTICSEARCH_DISK_AVAILABLE),0) ELASTICSEARCH_DISK_AVAILABLE,NVL(max(ELASTICSEARCH_DISK_USED),0) ELASTICSEARCH_DISK_USED FROM TB_PAAS_ZHZY
SELECT NVL(max(REDIS_MEMORY_USAGE),0) REDIS_MEMORY_USAGE FROM TB_PAAS_ZHZY

SELECT ODS_TIME,CPU_USAGE,CPU_USED,MEMORY_USAGE,MEMORY_USED,NVL(STORAGE_TOTAL,0) STORAGE_TOTAL,NVL(STORAGE_USED,0) STORAGE_USED FROM TB_PAAS_ZHZY WHERE TYPE_SITE='hadoop'
ORDER BY ODS_TIME ASC

SELECT ODS_TIME,CPU_USAGE,CPU_USED,MEMORY_USAGE,MEMORY_USED,NVL(STORAGE_TOTAL,0) STORAGE_TOTAL,NVL(STORAGE_USED,0) STORAGE_USED FROM TB_PAAS_ZHZY WHERE TYPE_SITE='Libra'
ORDER BY ODS_TIME ASC

SELECT ODS_TIME,ELASTICSEARCH_CPU_TOTAL,ELASTICSEARCH_CPU_USAGE,ELASTICSEARCH_MEMORY_TOTAL,ELASTICSEARCH_MEMORY_USED,ELASTICSEARCH_DISK_AVAILABLE,ELASTICSEARCH_DISK_USED FROM TB_PAAS_ZHZY
ORDER BY ODS_TIME ASC

SELECT ODS_TIME,REDIS_MEMORY_TOTAL,REDIS_MEMORY_USAGE FROM TB_PAAS_ZHZY
ORDER BY ODS_TIME ASC
SELECT NVL(max(CPU_USAGE),0) CPU_USAGE FROM TB_PAAS_ZHZY WHERE TYPE_SITE='hadoop' and APPLY_NAME=#{appName}
SELECT NVL(max(MEMORY_USAGE),0) MEMORY_USAGE FROM TB_PAAS_ZHZY WHERE TYPE_SITE='hadoop' and APPLY_NAME=#{appName}
SELECT sum(CPU_TOTAL) CPU_TOTAL ,sum(MEMORY_TOTAL) MEMORY_TOTAL FROM TB_PAAS_ZHZY WHERE TYPE_SITE='hadoop' and APPLY_NAME=#{appName}
SELECT NVL(max(CPU_USAGE),0) CPU_USAGE FROM TB_PAAS_ZHZY WHERE TYPE_SITE='Libra' and APPLY_NAME=#{appName}
SELECT NVL(max(STORAGE_USAGE),0) STORAGE_USAGE FROM TB_PAAS_ZHZY WHERE TYPE_SITE='Libra' and APPLY_NAME=#{appName}
SELECT NVL(max(MEMORY_USAGE),0) MEMORY_USAGE FROM TB_PAAS_ZHZY WHERE TYPE_SITE='Libra' and APPLY_NAME=#{appName}
SELECT sum(MEMORY_TOTAL) MEMORY_TOTAL,sum(CPU_TOTAL) CPU_TOTAL ,sum(STORAGE_TOTAL) STORAGE_TOTAL FROM TB_PAAS_ZHZY WHERE TYPE_SITE='Libra' and APPLY_NAME=#{appName}

SELECT ELASTICSEARCH_CPU_TOTAL,ELASTICSEARCH_CPU_USAGE,ELASTICSEARCH_MEMORY_TOTAL,ELASTICSEARCH_MEMORY_USED,ODS_TIME, SUPER_CLUSTER_CN,SUPER_CLUSTER_EN,ELASTICSEARCH_HOSTS_NUMBER FROM TB_PAAS_ZHZY WHERE APPLY_NAME=#{appName}
order by ODS_TIME
SELECT NVL(max(STORAGE_USAGE),0) STORAGE_USAGE FROM TB_PAAS_ZHZY WHERE APPLY_NAME=#{appName}
SELECT NVL(ELASTICSEARCH_MEMORY_TOTAL,0) ELASTICSEARCH_MEMORY_TOTAL,NVL(ELASTICSEARCH_MEMORY_USED,0) ELASTICSEARCH_MEMORY_USED FROM TB_PAAS_ZHZY WHERE APPLY_NAME=#{appName}
SELECT NVL(max(ELASTICSEARCH_CPU_USAGE),0) ELASTICSEARCH_CPU_USAGE FROM TB_PAAS_ZHZY WHERE APPLY_NAME=#{appName}
SELECT sum(ELASTICSEARCH_MEMORY_TOTAL) ELASTICSEARCH_MEMORY_TOTAL,sum(ELASTICSEARCH_CPU_TOTAL) ELASTICSEARCH_CPU_TOTAL,sum(STORAGE_TOTAL) STORAGE_TOTAL FROM TB_PAAS_ZHZY WHERE APPLY_NAME=#{appName}
SELECT sum(REDIS_MEMORY_TOTAL) REDIS_MEMORY_TOTAL FROM TB_PAAS_ZHZY WHERE APPLY_NAME=#{appName}
SELECT NVL(max(REDIS_MEMORY_USAGE),0) REDIS_MEMORY_USAGE FROM TB_PAAS_ZHZY WHERE APPLY_NAME=#{appName}
